Name: Caché
Language(s): Caché ObjectScript (dynamic language)  Basic Java/NET object mapping supported
SQL support: SQL subset Object notation allowed Supports embedded SQL  dynamic SQL and xDBC access
Description: MUMPS ancestry Includes builtin support for XML  Web/AJAX and an EMB system called Ensemble Supports embedded  client/server and distributed implementations

Name: ConceptBase
Description: historical db  active rules  metamodeling  deductive rules

Name: Db4o
Description: Native Queries  LINQ support  automatic schema evolution  Transparent Activation/Persistence  replication to RDBMS  Object Manager plugin for Visual Studio and Eclipse

Name: GemStone/S
Description: Persistent  transactional  multiuser Smalltalk developed by GemTalk Systems

Name: Objectivity/DB
Language(s): C  C#  Java  Python  Smalltalk and XML

Name: ObjectStore
SQL support: SQL subset (also has own object query language)
Description: Embedded database supporting efficient  distributed management of C and Java objects Avoids the complexities and limitations of ORM products such as Hibernate by storing objects directly with their relationships intact Uses a pagebased mapping system for fast locking and efficient  distributed  clientside caching

Name: ODABA
Datatypes: Basic Types  Classes  Multiple inheritance  Weak Typed

Name: OpenLink Virtuoso
Language(s): C  Java/JSP  ASP  ASPX  Mono  RDF  SPARQL  SPARUL  SQL  Perl  Python  PHP  Ruby  XML  ODBC  JDBC  ADONET  more

Name: Perst
Language(s): Java (including Java SE  Java ME & Android)  C# (including NET  NET Compact Framework  Mono & Silverlight)
Description: Small footprint embedded database Diverse indexes and specialized collection classes; LINQ; replication; ACID transactions; native full text search; includes Silverlight  Android and Java ME demo apps

Name: WakandaDB
SQL support: No support REST and SSJS can be used instead
Description: NoSQL REST / ServerSide JavaScript engine Integrates Webkit JavaScriptCore engine with HTML5 JS APIs supported on the server Tables and columns are replaced by JavaScript DataClasses and attributes

Name: Zope Object Database
SQL support: No support Object indexing and searching is done through ZCatalog facility
